title: Message to the Chamber of Commerce of Palo Alto, California.
text:
My dear Mr. Mendenhall:

I am particularly gratified to receive the message of approval and encouragement from my friends of the Chamber of Commerce which you so kindly convey in your telegram of the thirtieth. It is most heartening and I cordially appreciate it. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. D. A. Mendenhall, President, Palo Alto Chamber of Commerce, Palo Alto, California]
